text: Department of Excise & Taxation, Haryana is a Ministry and department of the Government of Haryana in India. ==Description== This department came into existence when Haryana was established as a new state within India after being separated from Punjab. Dushyant chautala is the cabinet minister responsible for this department from October 2014.New CM Khattar Keeps Home, Abhimanyu Finance & Revenue ==See also== * Government of Haryana ==References== Excise and Taxation Category:Economy of Haryana
title: Department of Excise & Taxation, Haryana
